meanings.definition: Not having a barb or barbs.
meanings.sent1: The unbarbed hook was safe to touch.
meanings.sent2: The cat's fur was soft and unbarbed.
meanings.sent3: The unbarbed arrow missed the target and hit a tree instead.
meanings.sent4: Her unbarbed words were gentle and kind.
meanings.sent5: The unbarbed fence kept the sheep safely in the pasture.

meanings.sent1: The unbarbed wire was smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The unbarbed rose stem was easy to hold.
meanings.sent3: The unbarbed fishhook made it easier to catch and release fish unharmed.
meanings.sent4: His unbarbed comments were well-received by everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unbarbed thorns on the plant were a pleasant surprise.
